name: Amara Software
overview:
Amara Software provides animation software solutions to create a wide variety of Flash text and photo effects and web animations.

Amara Software’s animation software saves creations in the popular SWF file format, which can be used in any website and viewed in the Adobe Flash Player. No knowledge of Flash is needed to create animations with Amara Software.

Amara Software currently has 5 Flash animation software applications: Amara News Ticker, Amara Menu Builder, Amara Intro and Banner Builder, Amara Slideshow Builder, and Amara Photo Animation Software.

All Amara Software applications are shareware: users can fully try them out for free before deciding to buy. The fully functional applications can be easily downloaded from www.amarasoftware.com and taken for a test drive.

Prices for the registered versions range from just US$19.95 to US$49.95. A 25% discount applies when buying Amara Software bundles.

providerships.title: web content writing, promotion, press releases, article marketing
